title: The Man Who Built the World
description: Matthew Cassidy stands on the brink of self-destruction. His career is in tatters and his marriage is hanging by a thread. Then one day he receives an unexpected phone call from his estranged father and Matt is forced to return to the home town he abandoned in a torrent of violence sixteen years before. There he will face his demons and find either his salvation or the destruction of everything he holds dear.The Man Who Built the World is a paranormal/fantasy/horror novel of 230 pages.Chris Ward is the author of the science fiction epic The Tube Riders, as well as dozens of published short stories, the best of which can be found on Amazon as part of the collection Ms Ito's Bird & Other Stories.
author: Chris  Ward
